US Senate to vote on $95 bln Ukraine, Israel aid bill after failed border dealThe U.S. Senate was due to vote on Thursday on a $95.34 billion bill that includes aid for Ukraine, Israel and the Indo-Pacific, after Republicans blocked compromise legislation that also included a long-sought overhaul of immigration policy. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 15:15:40 GMT 2OHFQCKNYFNKPN7TRFFXJWGARM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-senate-vote-95-bln-ukraine-israel-aid-bill-after-failed-border-deal-2024-02-08/Patricia Zengerle世界美国
US offers $10mln reward for information on Hive ransomware leadersThe United States is offering a reward of up to $10 million for information leading to the identification or location of key leaders in the Hive ransomware organized crime group, the State Department said in a statement on Thursday. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 14:32:08 GMT 76RMG4RNE5M4ZLU7ZBA4YVHHVI https://www.reuters.com/technology/us-offers-10mln-reward-information-hive-ransomware-leaders-2024-02-08/Reuters技术
Polish PM says U.S. Republicans should be ashamed for not backing Ukraine aidPolish Prime Minister Donald Tusk said on Thursday that Republican senators in the United States should be ashamed for blocking a $60 billion aid package for Ukraine, saying former U.S. President Ronald Reagan would be "turning in his grave". Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:57:09 GMT W23JS4ZU4VMEDBT3LVJEZYIXEI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-pm-says-us-republicans-should-be-ashamed-not-backing-ukraine-aid-2024-02-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Philippines says 110 missing after landslide kills at least 11The number of missing from a landslide that struck a southern Philippine province rose to 110 on Thursday as rescuers recovered more bodies, bringing the official death toll to 11, disaster officials said. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:55:10 GMT M4TXCGECZVMQVDMAL4HINZSFE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-says-110-missing-after-landslide-kills-least-11-2024-02-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
What you need to know about the 2024 Finnish presidential electionFinns vote on Sunday in a presidential election runoff between centre-right candidate Alexander Stubb of Finland's National Coalition Party and liberal Green Party member Pekka Haavisto. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:41:18 GMT OUVYPR76FFN6TCU2D5N7PAUQGA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/what-you-need-know-about-2024-finnish-presidential-election-2024-02-08/Elviira Luoma, Canan Sevgili世界欧洲
Displaced Gazans resort to living in chicken shedsWith one million Gazans displaced from their homes by Israeli bombardments seeking refuge in the border town of Rafah, five families have moved into a chicken farm, living in its long concrete sheds, the battery coops transformed into bunk beds. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:23:42 GMT LPCW2IGAKVIZJAMGZOGQ5MMY4Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/displaced-gazans-resort-living-chicken-sheds-2024-02-08/Saleh Salem世界中东
Putin and Xi reject US 'interference', praise their own ties and trade - KremlinRussian President Vladimir Putin and Chinese President Xi Jinping spoke by phone on Thursday and both rejected what they called U.S. interference in the affairs of other countries, the Kremlin said. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:18:06 GMT X2NVIGZQYVNETKDM3K773G7RVU https://www.reuters.com/world/putin-xi-reject-us-interference-praise-their-own-ties-trade-kremlin-2024-02-08/Reuters世界
EU drafts guidelines as it urges Big Tech to protect democratic electionsThe European Union's executive has started to compile guidelines for Big Tech platforms to prevent disinformation, hate speech and counterfeits from disrupting the process of democratic elections. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:12:48 GMT EJRLBIVY55KPVCUL3HVTAOMA3M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-drafts-guidelines-it-urges-big-tech-protect-democratic-elections-2024-02-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Meta's oversight board to investigate posts about Australian Indigenous voteMeta's oversight board said on Friday it will examine two cases on how the social media giant handled potentially misleading posts that were shared ahead of the Australian referendum on Indigenous recognition in October last year. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:07:00 GMT LJPMQYNL7ZPGJMYOFTX3OX74KI https://www.reuters.com/technology/metas-oversight-board-investigate-posts-about-australian-indigenous-vote-2024-02-08/Praveen Menon技术
Scholz, Biden to discuss Ukraine aid, NATO and Israel warGerman Chancellor Olaf Scholz said his talks with U.S. President Joe Biden in Washington on Friday will focus on how to strengthen support for Ukraine to help it battle Russia's invasion. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 12:20:37 GMT WZP77ZBZW5KLPIDSHQ45KOHF2A https://www.reuters.com/world/scholz-biden-discuss-ukraine-aid-nato-israel-war-2024-02-08/Andreas Rinke, Sarah Marsh世界
Brazil police seizing Bolsonaro passport, arresting close aidesBrazil's federal police on Thursday sought to confiscate former President Jair Bolsonaro's passport and arrest some of his closest aides, sources said, as part of an investigation into an alleged coup attempt after he lost the 2022 election. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 11:42:35 GMT QU56FH3JRJPCJBX4C6BSYM3QNM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-police-target-bolsonaro-allies-probe-into-coup-attempt-2024-02-08/Lisandra Paraguassu, Ricardo Brito, Gabriel Stargardter世界美洲
